action_plan.empty_title: Ready to Create Your Action Plan?
action_plan.empty_message: Your students can lead the way! Create an action plan to reduce plastic waste at your school. You can create it online or download a printable form to complete offline.
action_plan.tooltip_total_items: The total number of plastic reduction commitments your school has made. Each action item represents a specific type of plastic your school plans to reduce.
action_plan.tooltip_items_reduced: Total plastic items your school aims to eliminate annually. This is calculated by taking the difference between baseline and target quantities, then multiplying by frequency (52 for weekly, 12 for monthly, or 1 for yearly).
action_plan.tooltip_weight_reduced: Total weight of plastic waste prevented annually. Each plastic item type has a standard weight (e.g., bottles: 15g, cups: 5g, straws: 0.42g) that's multiplied by the number of items reduced.
action_plan.tooltip_ocean_bottles: Equivalent plastic bottles kept out of the ocean. Based on standard 15g bottles, this shows the scale of your impact in relatable terms.
action_plan.tooltip_fish_saved: Fish protected from plastic ingestion. Studies show that 50g of plastic can be harmful to marine life, so this estimates the number of fish potentially saved.
action_plan.tooltip_sea_turtles: Your plastic reduction measured in sea turtle weights. An average sea turtle weighs about 140kg, providing a powerful visualization of your impact.
action_plan.tooltip_co2_prevented: Carbon dioxide emissions prevented by reducing plastic production. Producing 1kg of plastic generates approximately 6kg of CO‚ÇÇ emissions.
action_plan.tooltip_oil_saved: Fossil fuel oil conserved by avoiding plastic production. About 2kg (approximately 2 liters) of oil is needed to produce 1kg of plastic.
action_plan.tooltip_tons_prevented: Total plastic waste prevented measured in metric tons. This shows the cumulative weight of all plastic items your school commits to reducing.

promise_dialog.description: Set a goal to reduce plastic waste at your school. Choose a plastic item type and set your reduction targets.
promise_dialog.notes_placeholder: Add any additional notes about this action item...
promise_dialog.delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this action item?
promise_dialog.delete_confirmation_message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your action item and remove it from your impact calculations.

photo_consent.title: Action Required: Photo Consent Confirmation
photo_consent.description: Please confirm that your school has the necessary permission to share images of children in your evidence submissions. Download and complete the template, then upload the signed document.
photo_consent.status_pending: Your document is under review by the admin team.

photo_consent.toast_file_too_large_desc: Please upload a file smaller than 10MB.
photo_consent.toast_success_desc: Photo consent document uploaded successfully. It will be reviewed by our admin team.
photo_consent.toast_upload_failed_desc: Failed to upload document. Please try again.

welcome_modal.title: Welcome to Your Dashboard!
welcome_modal.description: Your central hub for reducing plastic waste at your school. Here's what you can do:
welcome_modal.section_progress_description: Track your school's journey through the Inspire, Investigate, and Act stages
welcome_modal.section_evidence_description: Submit photos and videos showing your plastic reduction achievements
welcome_modal.section_resources_description: Access helpful guides, lesson plans, and educational materials
welcome_modal.section_action_plan_description: Create and manage your plastic reduction promises and goals
welcome_modal.section_team_description: Invite and manage your school's team members
welcome_modal.section_events_description: Join workshops, webinars, and community gatherings
